publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of saynt Iohan eua[n]gelyste, by me [J. Skot for] Iohan Butler,

notesStmt.note: By Stephen Hawes, whose name appears on B4r.
Imprint from colophon; actual printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
